attributes.action: We do not want Nick Clegg to be knighted in New Year's Honours list
attributes.background: What has he done to deserve this? 5 years as deputy prime minister? So what! He has broken a number of promises including tuition fees, a coalition with the Conservative Goverment and a referendum on Europe. We demand Clegg doesn't receive any knighthood.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
